185774124.review:
Jeux sympathique sans non plus révolutionner quoi que ce soit. Bon défouloir si on a un besoin d'utiliser tout ce qu'on trouve sous la main.
Cependant, l'histoire et la redondance en font un jeu passable sans plus.
Pleins d'armes, accessoires et véhicules pour se divertir sur les zombies. Aucunes ne restera mémorable.
Le multi est dispo dans sa version de base mais aucun joueur trouvé sur une semaine de test.
ATTENTION: Le multi est un mode à part, pas une version COOP du mode Histoire !
Probablement que les DLC améliorent la qualité du jeu ou son impact.

10/20 pour moi aurait été une bonne note.
Sympa si en promo. Sinon passez votre chemin.

185716167.review:
O dead rising 4 segue na mesma linha de acontecimento dos anteriores, confesso que fiquei meio receoso antes de comprar pela chuva de críticas por ele ser '' menos divertido que os anteriores'', mas pelo menos pra mim isso não foi verdade. Algumas coisas foram retiradas do jogo como os psicopatas, mas o pessoal tem que entender que é um jogo novo e não é obrigado a ser a mesma coisa dos anteriores, senão não seria um NOVO JOGO. Os graficos do jogo estão lindos e bem mais realistas que os anteriores, as mecanicas seguem iguais , mas com um polimento melhor.
A história talvez não seja das mais elaboradas, mas na minha opinião não fugiu muito do que foram os anteriores, parem com essa síndrome da nostalgia. Recomendo demais!

185709507.review: 垃圾遊戲! 所有優點都沒有了的巨作，失敗!

185673464.review:
This game is trash, any of the previous Dead rising entries and dlc are far away in another class of greatness than this. Its not due to any weird dog whistle terms or DEI trash. Its just due to bad writing and lackluster performances. Frank is not the same as either OTR or Dead Rising 1. He lacks any of his witty or serious charm. Yeah he cracks jokes and puns or whatever, but its like hearing your dad say the cheesiest shit in hopes of being funny while you are trying to enjoy something on a serious level.  The plot can't take itself seriously, it feels like the Joss Whedon esq writing cant ever stop. Dead Rising 1, 2, and 3 for all of its goofiness tried to ground you in the weight of the situation. The gravity of it all. This game feels like it wants to do that with Vick's character, but ultimately it just feels like she is overeacting whenever Frank is around. Though to be fair with this entry, Frank feels like he just jokes about death and getting money. Which the greedy part was part of his character In dead rising 1, but he quickly abandoned that as he got addicted to looking for the scoop. 

Overall I could write an essay, the point is though, just stay away, I got this in a bundle with Dead Rising 2 and OTR, or else I wouldn't have touched it.

185309601.review:
I bought this on Xbox on release and a friend bought it for me steam when it was on sale so we could try the multiplayer. 

I simply cannot recommend buying this game. It's such a far cry from what Dead Rising used to be. Sure, It has it's moments of fun, and some of the combo weapons are quite entertaining, but the game doesn't come close to any of the first 3 games. The Co-op mode is a massive joke, not even having a true Co-op story mode like the previous titles. Instead, you and your friends wander around the mall doing random pointless objectives and all weapons break after only a handful of hits. Only pick this up if it's on steep discount. If you're that desperate for more Dead Rising though I would say just go play any of the first three.

185126425.review: Achei o jogo sem personalidade, diferente dos anteriores da série. É uma reciclagem do 3, tentando ser engraçado que nem o 1 e o 2 mas de forma forçada, porque o Frank West desse não é o mesmo que conhecemos. 185061086.review:
Se la casa madre, a meno di un anno dalla [i]release[/i], ha chiuso i battenti della succursale di [b]Capcom Vancouver[/b] ci sarà un motivo. Già col terzo episodio, la serie non aveva più molto da dire, ma con questo capitolo si è toccato davvero il fondo. Il gioco è plasmato su [b]Dead Rising 3[/b], per quanto faccia piacere il ritorno di [i]Frank West[/i] e del centro commerciale di [i]Willamette[/i], si avverte fin da subito una grossa mancanza di cura e qualità. Trama pessima, assenza di psicopatici carismatici, assets riciclati, scarsa ottimizzazione e continua presenza di stupidi bug. Anche i [i]DLC[/i] (inclusi nel pacchetto) risultano piuttosto insulsi, si salva giusto [i]Eroi Capcom[/i] come idea, ma la realizzazione lascia spesso a desiderare. Circa 10-12 ore per il completamento della storia, molte di più se ci si concentra sulle secondarie e sui contenuti extra.

PRO:
- il ritorno di [i]Frank West[/i]
- bene o male è [i]Dead Rising[/i]
- modalità [i]Capcom Heroes[/i] divertente

CONTRO:
- nulla di nuovo sul lato [i]gameplay[/i]
- poco coinvolgente, personaggi poco interessanti
- scarsa ottimizzazione, presenta continua di bug

VOTO: 6,5

Se non avete mai giocato un [b]Dead Rising[/b], piuttosto recuperatevi la [i]Remastered[/i] del primo, questo titolo è un prodotto mediocre che può suscitare attenzione a malapena nei fan più accaniti della serie.

184997075.review: Зомби+Крафт+Легенда из первой части+Хороший Сюжет и т.п. Хорошая игрушка для расслабление после работы или выпустить пар!

184697583.review:
Demorei bastante para comprar Dead Rising 4 porque muita gente falava que era um dos piores da série. Mas, quando finalmente resolvi dar uma chance, me arrependi de não ter jogado antes!

O jogo é muito divertido, e a sensação de enfrentar hordas gigantescas de zumbis é incrível. Sim, algumas partes são meio repetitivas, mas isso não tirou o prazer de aproveitar a história ( que não tem kkk) e o gameplay.

O final me surpreendeu positivamente, e no geral, foi uma experiência que valeu a pena. Se você curte jogos do gênero e gosta da franquia, recomendo sem dúvidas!

184405925.review: 愚蠢的队友，不过几十块买来爽杀丧尸还行

184273761.review: Dead Rising 4 is a decent game but a poor Dead Rising game. While there are plenty of enjoyable moments, and the gameplay loop is pretty solid, many of the series' staples have been removed. Even compared to Dead Rising 3, which switched things up quite a bit, Dead Rising 4 feels like it's from a completely different franchise. To make matters worse, the story is terrible and not engaging at all. More importantly, though, Frank was completely butchered and has become one of the most unlikeable characters in any game I've played. However, even though Dead Rising 4 is a bad Dead Rising game, it's still pretty fun and can be enjoyable; I like to think of it as the Resident Evil 6 of the Dead Rising series. With a decent combat system, fun weapons, and some okay boss encounters, there is some fun to be had with Dead Rising 4. Overall, for fans of the Dead Rising games, Dead Rising 4 is very disappointing and probably not worth your time. However, if you can get past the fact that it's a Dead Rising game and just focus on what's on offer, it can be a pretty enjoyable time.

184191770.review: Jogabilidade instintiva, gráficos aceitáveis e muito divertido.

184186152.review: Very fun game. No timer like the other dead rising games. Best in series.

184107171.review:
Dead Rising 4 намагається повернути серію до витоків, але втрачає її унікальність і шарм. Гра пропонує стандартний набір механік знищення зомбі, але позбавляє відчуття напруги через надмірну простоту і відсутність таймера, що раніше створював атмосферу стресу та виклику.
Френк Вест, головний герой, виглядає пародією на себе з попередніх частин, а його характер став поверхневим і позбавленим харизми. Сюжет слабкий і мало захоплює, а святковий різдвяний антураж здається лише дешевою спробою виділитися.
Гра також страждає від технічних недоліків і одноманітності геймплею, що швидко набридає. Відсутність кооперативного режиму в сюжетній кампанії лише додає розчарування.
Dead Rising 4 — це спрощена версія культової серії, яка втратила свою душу, прагнучи догодити масовій аудиторії.

Coole Zombie Metzelei. Das Spiel ist etwas ernster als die beiden Vorgänger aber der Klamauk ist nach wie vor vorhanden. Die Story ist ein wenig dünn aber wer braucht schon ne Story wenn man wahrlich hunderte, ach was sag ich TAUSENDE von Zombies erledigen kann.
Obwohl das Spiel als 'nicht unterstützt' für das Steam Deck gekennzeichnet ist, funktioniert es tadellos auf dem Steam Deck in den maximalen Einstellungen. Alles in allen ein gutes Gesamtpaket.

183834579.review:
Dead Rising 4 brings back Frank West as the playable character as we return to Willamette to celebrate the Holidays amidst another zombie outbreak, and work alongside others to uncover the cause of the outbreak.

While I enjoyed Dead Rising 4 for both the story and the gameplay, It's easy to notice the different controls and mechanics. This includes the removal of psychopath bosses in favor of a different but similar system instead and having a story and quests that aren't on time limits. No more time management in this game.

You also can't pick-up and throw items or your weapons, Leaving only standard throwable items available to be thrown. (I like to randomly pick-up & throw items at zombies in other Dead Rising games.)

As a Dead Rising game, the differences in mechanics, features and controls may cause some to not enjoy it. Though I got used to the controls, new systems and honestly most of all enjoyed the story.

183790964.review:
작년에 세일할때 사놓고 이제서야 해봄.
데드라이징 시리즈 자체는 처음이라 4로 시작했기에 스토리는 잘 모르겠고, 코스튬 입고 좀비들 학살하는 재미는 쏠쏠했다만

진행중 갑자기 멈춰서 강제 종료하고 다시 해야 되는 버그(컴퓨터 좋은 거 써도 심하다고 함),
마지막 보스전 피통 10%에서 진행이 되지 않는 버그 등 치명적인 버그들이 너무 많았어서
짜증이 위의 재미들보다 더 컸던 게임.

특히 마지막 보스전 버그는 스팀 커뮤니티 검색 및 구글링을 해도 찾을 수 없었는데, 
유튜브까지 찾아보다 어느 해외 유튜버 보스 공략 영상의 어느 유저 덧글 덕분에 겨우 해결했을 정도.
해당 덧글 언급으로는 '페이즈 바뀔때마다 컷신 끝나자마자 vick이 나타나게 될 전력 차단기 근처에 자리 잡고 보스 피통을 빼면 된다' 였음.

여튼 짜증 유발하는 치명적인 버그들로 인해 재미를 반감 시켜버리는 건 사실이라
솔직히 할인해도 개인적으로 추천하지는 않는 게임.
